greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangular by columns derived from (1, 2, 3,...) * (1, 2, 3,...).
formula: Given a (1, 2, 3,...) * (1, 2, 3,...) multiplication table; leftmost column
of the triangle = (1, 2, 3,...). Then shift down each successive column of
the array twice to get triangle A173997.
example: After the shift twice operation, we obtain:
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 05 2010
